page.title: 15ASHOVER LONG AGO.
page.content: Jane Stevens,Sammie Cook and Nikki Walton went to see an old lady called Mrs Featherstone.She has lived in Ashover for along time,and has seen many changes in Ashover.She said that the Parish Room was once the village school.The school she went to was Stavley,it was very strict .She did not wear school uniform.Mrs Featherstone also told us that she had not lived in Rose Cottage all her life.They entertained them selves at night by playing buttons and dominoes. When Mrs Fearthstone was little she did not have a T.V.The food was very different in the olden days, because they had bread and jam without butter but we have bread, butter and jam.They could not have butter because their family had 14 children and they all had to be fed on 1 wage.Also they did not have family allowence in their day
